channel.title: Message encryption - wickr
channel.description:
#wickr is it any good
Hi, this is my first post so forgive my poor formating I swear i'll learn ... Also not native eng speaker so bear with me.
So I encountered this app Wickr https://www.wickr.com/security
and i was wondering to what extent this kind of encryption is secure.
So let me know what you guys think and also alternatives etc.
Thanks
isamurai

Our mission is to transform how companies and organizations protect valuable, high-target communications. In doing so, we strive to build the most trusted communication platform in the world by investing in comprehensive and transparent security...
